backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing timestamped float readings, providing add, list, and latest-reading queries plus DTO builders and a simple greeting function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend updates, affected files, components, and test IDs for backend-URL corrections and E2E verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of major frontend files including App, hooks, utilities, Tailwind config, and the HTTP instructions card.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layer defining global theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI rendering authentication controls, HTTP instructions, latest reading card with manual refresh, and autoâ€‘refreshing readings table.
frontend/src/components/HttpLoggingInstr: Component that builds backend canister JSON endpoint URLs, shows copyable log/read/readings URLs, and displays a reference caffeine.xyz URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks polling backend actor for all readings and latest reading every 3 seconds with graceful handling of missing data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides helper functions to format numbers and convert bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date/time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors tied to CSS variables, typography, container settings, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioned feature descriptions, and requirement mappings for the app's backend and frontend.
